title: Nations condemn Taliban over targeted killings
content: US and allies "deeply concerned" about human rights abuses against former Afghan security forces.

title: Pope condemns treatment of migrants in Europe
content: Visiting a camp in Greece, Francis called on Europe to take responsibility for the situation.

title: Travel changes too late to stop Omicron - scientist
content: The return of pre-departure Covid tests for travellers to the UK will come into force on Tuesday.

title: Rescuers race to find survivors of Indonesia eruption
content: At least 13 people died after Mt Semeru erupted on Indonesia's Java island.

title: Prince William reveals toll of air ambulance rescues
content: The Duke of Cambridge recalls taking home other people's "sadness" when he was a pilot.

title: CNN fires Chris Cuomo for helping governor brother
content: The star TV host is sacked over efforts to help his brother defend himself against sexual harassment claims.

title: Ocean garbage patch is immense plastic habitat
content: Researchers discover coastal species living on debris miles from their natural surroundings.

title: Why France faces so much anger in West Africa
content: Despite engaging better with the African continent recently, the ex-colonial power faces a backlash.

title: Grenfell firm F1 deal 'nothing' to do with Hamilton
content: His F1 team Mercedes has been criticised for partnering with Kingspan, a firm linked to Grenfell Tower.

title: Indian forces kill 13 civilians amid ambush blunder
content: Home Minister Amit Shah expresses "anguish" after troops fire on miners in the country's north-east.

title: French climber handed Mont Blanc gems after find
content: The stones are believed to be from an Air India plane which crashed into the mountain in 1966.

title: Trump social media firm raises $1bn from investors
content: The former US president is working to launch a social media app called Truth Social early next year.

title: Snotty-nosed hippos test positive for Covid
content: Officials at Antwerp zoo do not know how the pair - now in quarantine - caught the virus.

title: Biden and Putin to talk amid rising Ukraine tensions
content: On Tuesday the US and Russian leaders will speak amid mounting concerns of Russia invading Ukraine.
